description:
The right tool makes all the difference. This kit has a serrated knife for crusty breads, a straight edged knife for cheeses, meats and veggies, a compact peeler, a cutting board on and a corkscrew in case your picnic includes a bottle or two.

  • Stainless steel blades are easy to clean
  • Blades lock securely in place with a simple twist collar
  • #10 knife has an integrated corkscrew
  • Towel doubles as a knife roll, 3 elastic loops hold tools
  • Includes: beech wood cutting board, serrated #12 folding knife, straight edged #10 folding knife, #6 folding vegetable peeler and towel
  • Cutting board:20 x 13 x 1.5cm, No.12, 12cm Serrated blade, No.10 Corkscrew with 10cm blade, 23cm open, No.06 Folding Peeler – 6cm blade, 16.5cm open, towel – 32 x 32cm
name: Opinel Nomad Cooking Kit
